title: How to Unleash Your Tarot Card Reading Superpower
headline: Learn to read and understand the symbolism behind tarot cards with this free online tarot reading course.
description: In this beginner course, students will learn the fundamentals of tarot cards. We have designed this course to help you learn how to read tarot cards and understand them in three hours or less. We will teach you how to unlock your intuition and apply that knowledge to become a tarot card reader. You can use tarot cards as a tool for self-care and guidance in everyday life. So register today and learn a new skill.
courseDescription:
Intuition is defined as ‘the capacity for intuitive understanding, independent of conscious thought’. We have designed this course to guide people in unlocking their intuition and applying that knowledge to become tarot card readers. You will learn about all 78 tarot cards divided into two sections: major arcana (major mysteries) and minor arcana (minor mysteries). Discover how to read different card spreads and apply this understanding to client readings.  

The course will teach you how to use your tarot cards to give guidance and become a healer and life coach. It is believed that tarot cards can answer questions about what is happening in an individual's personal orbit. This incorporates questions about love, money, career, goals and general life path. In addition, we will teach you how to interpret the cards you pull.

If you are at the beginning of your spiritual journey and desire to learn tarot cards, this course is a great place to start. Tarot cards may help spark conversations, find meaning in your circumstances and identify solutions. In addition, tarot cards have a spiritual component to them, which may appeal to those who don't associate with organised religion. So what are you waiting for? Enrol and start this journey now.

Start Course Now
certificateDetail:
All Alison courses are free to enrol study and complete. To successfully complete this course and become an Alison Graduate, you need to achieve 80% or higher in each course assessment. Once you have completed this course, you have the option to acquire an official Diploma, which is a great way to share your achievement with the world.

Your Alison is:
  • Ideal for sharing with potential employers
  • Include it in your CV, professional social media profiles and job applications.
  • An indication of your commitment to continuously learn, upskill & achieve high results.
  • An incentive for you to continue empowering yourself through lifelong learning.
Alison offers 3 types of Diplomas for completed Diploma courses:
  • Digital : a downloadable in PDF format immediately available to you when you complete your purchase.
  • : a physical version of your officially branded and security-marked , posted to you with FREE shipping.
  • Framed : a physical version of your officially branded and security marked in a stylish frame, posted to you with FREE shipping.

All are available to purchase through the Alison Shop. For more information on purchasing Alison , please visit our FAQs. If you decide not to purchase your Alison , you can still demonstrate your achievement by sharing your Learner Record or Learner Achievement Verification, both of which are accessible from your Dashboard. For more details on our pricing, please visit our Pricing Page
